description:
Keep your fitness momentum going in cold weather. Lightly insulated and weather-resistant, these pants provide warmth and versatility in equal measure, and won't get in the way when you’re pushing the pace on the loop trail or racing circuit.

  • Stretch nylon blend balances protection, warmth and breathability
  • DWR (durable water repellent) treatment to shed moisture and snow
  • PrimaLoft® 40g synthetic insulation is warm even in wet conditions
  • Stretchy material, articulated knees and ergonomic seams enhance mobility
  • Belt loops and half-elastic waist
  • Pockets with zippers to secure your belongings
  • Reflective details increase low light visibility
  • Zippered lower leg gusset fits over many types of footwear
  • Ankle gaiter seals out snow
name: Salomon Nova XWarm Pants - Men's
